about_the_game:
Unite humanity and shape the society of tomorrow with the official game soundtrack. Delve into a world destroyed by climate change while enjoying the deep and melodic emotionally charged music.

The whole album consists of 38 original tracks that run for 1:51h and includes 4 vocal songs. The package includes high-quality MP3 files, as well as OGG and lossless FLAC versions.

The music has been composed by Neil Haverty and Misha Bower (Bruce Peninsula band), together with Piotr Musiał (Frostpunk, This War of Mine, The Witcher 3: Blood and Wine) and Paweł Wawrzeńczyk (Growing Up), featuring the vocal performance from Michał Dąbrowski (Cereus band) and strings recorded by Mateusz Smoczyński.

In addition to the album we are also offering Floodland wallpapers for you to decorate your desktop or mobile.

This package includes:
• 38 pieces of music across two discs
• 6 Floodland wallpaper – six for your PC and six for your phone
